long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A great Chrome extension that allows you to store your clips and bookmarks and easily copy and delete them with just a click. Take note that the delete all button requires double click as a security measure to prevent you from accidentally deleting all your saved clips.
